posts.content:
Any observations on this , seems good on dimensions as in its tall not long, any advise appreciated.
https://www.amazon.co.uk/SuperBatt-Leis ... op?ie=UTF8

I have that one in my bus. Fits fine, charges and lasts well. Will run a propex for about 1 1/2 to 2 nights without needing to be recharged. Runs phones etc without any issues.
Had it just over a year.

posts.content: What’s the biggest dimensions for a leisure battery that will fit in the rear corner out of interest? I’ve seen some people turn the battery through 90º, not sure if that helps or not? Just wondering what the best/biggest A/h battery that will fit?

If you have a later bus, then you can turn the battery 90 degrees. That allows you to fit a 110-120 amp/hr version. Otherwise you're generally restricted to 90-100 amp/hr batteries.

If you have a walk through, watch out for the height of he battery.
